statements: DELETE FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE location = 'Syria' AND reported_by = 'Human Rights Watch';
DELETE FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'disappearance' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_id = 1001 AND location = 'City A'
DELETE FROM AidOrganizations WHERE organization_name = 'Organization XYZ' AND contact_email = 'info@organizationxyz.com'
DELETE FROM victims WHERE age < 18 AND status = 'minor';
DELETE FROM victims WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'F';
